discourse_list.title: [Agenda/Discussion] LIQ-2.0 Stakeholder Discussion - Wednesday, October 14, 2020 17:00:00 UTC

content.content: LIQ-2.0 Stakeholder Discussion Eastern Time (US and Canada): Wednesday, October 14, 2020 1:00:00 PM Eastern Time (US and Canada) Dial In Details Zoom Call Agenda  Please read the technical overview ahead of meeting Question and Answer session over LIQ-2.0   Intro If you’re a community stakeholder interested in the outcome of LIQ-2.0 and have questions, comments, or concerns, please bring them to this meeting.  Prior to this meeting, please read the technical overview. Links Calendar Video/Voice Dial by your location: +1 312 626 6799 US (Chicago) +1 929 205 6099 US (New York) +1 301 715 8592 US (Germantown) +1 346 248 7799 US (Houston) +1 669 900 6833 US (San Jose) +1 253 215 8782 US (Tacoma) Meeting ID: 897 2594 3336 Passcode: 036110 Find your local number: https://us02web.zoom.us/u/kckc4HiOjr
content.GPT-summary: The post is an announcement for a stakeholder discussion about LIQ-2.0, providing details about the date, time, and dial-in information. The post also encourages stakeholders to read the technical overview before the meeting and to bring any questions, comments, or concerns to the discussion.
